# Werewolf Killing

As the Werewolf, you're a killer that can only kill during lights.
Werewolf can call lights (and only lights) to start their rampage.
You have a low kill cooldown and do not lunge toward your kills.

All your kills will have the Mauled death reason.

  • Kill Cooldown
    • Set the Werewolfs kill cooldown
  • Maul Radius
    • Set the Werewolfs maul radius
  • Can Vent
    • ON: the Werewolf can vent
    • OFF: the Werewolf cannot vent
  • Has Impostor Vision
    • ON: the Werewolf has Impostor vision
    • OFF: the Werewolf does not have Impostor vision
